org.forgerock.openig.log

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openig.log.Logger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogSink

    public class Logger
extends Object
implements LogSink
    Wraps a log sink and exposes a set of convenience methods for various logging activities.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.forgerock.openig.log.LogSink

    • Constructor Detail

      • Logger

        public Logger(LogSink sink,
      String source)
        Constructs a new logger. If the supplied sink is null, then a NullLogSink will be used.
        Parameters:
        sink - the sink to write log entries to.
        source - the base source to write all log entries with.

    • Method Detail

      • logMessage

        public void logMessage(LogLevel level,
              String message)
        Logs the message at the specified log level.
        Parameters:
        level - the log level to set in the log entry.
        message - the message to be logged.

      • getTimer

        public LogTimer getTimer()
        Returns a new timer to measure elapsed time. Entries are written to the log with a STAT log level.
        Returns:
        A timer to measure elapsed time.

      • getTimer

        public LogTimer getTimer(String event)
        Returns a new timer to measure elapsed time for a specified event. The event is appended to the source in hierarchical fashion. Entries are written to the log with a STAT log level.
        Parameters:
        event - the event that is being timed.
        Returns:
        A timer to measure elapsed time for a specified event.

      • log

        public void log(LogEntry entry)
        Logs an entry. This implementation will prepend the logger source to all log entries.
        Specified by:
        log in interface LogSink
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to be logged.

      • isLoggable

        public boolean isLoggable(String event,
                 LogLevel level)
        Returns true if the entry may be logged, given the specified event and log level.
        Specified by:
        isLoggable in interface LogSink
        Parameters:
        event - the event (sub-source) that is intended to be logged.
        level - the log level of the entry to be logged.
        Returns:
        true if the entry may be logged.

      • isLoggable

        public boolean isLoggable(LogLevel level)
        Returns true if the entry may be logged, given the source of this logger and the specified log level.
        Parameters:
        level - the log level of the entry to be logged.
        Returns:
        true if the entry may be logged.
